svg.desc: Beating Valentine Animation of an SVG Heart with text that can be inserted into an SVG image then scaled and positioned where desired. This image was written by Jay Nick Handcoding SVG since 2001 Author of eBook, Learn SVG Interactively and STEAM Coded String Art, published by Catto Creations, LLC http://www.steamcoded.org http://www.cattocreations.com http://www.jaynick.com
